config.name: listeners
id
config.desc: The id for this node. If one is not specified, one is generated.

config.name: leaf
config.desc: true if this node is a leaf and does not have children

methods.name: sort
methods.desc: Sorts this nodes children using the supplied sort function

methods.name: removeChild
methods.desc: Removes a child node from this node.

methods.name: isAncestor
methods.desc: Returns true if the passed node is an ancestor (at any point) of this node.

methods.name: contains
methods.desc: Returns true if this node is an ancestor (at any point) of the passed node.

methods.name: cascade
methods.desc: Cascades down the tree from this node, calling the specified function with each node. The scope (this) of function call will be the scope provided or the current node. The arguments to the function will be the args provided or the current node. If the function returns false at any point, the cascade is stopped on that branch.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope of the function (defaults to current node)

params.name: args
params.desc: (optional) The args to call the function with (default to passing the current node)

methods.name: getDepth
methods.desc: Returns depth of this node (the root node has a depth of 0)

methods.name: getPath
methods.desc: Returns the path for this node. The path can be used to expand or select this node programmatically.

params.name: attr
params.desc: (optional) The attr to use for the path (defaults to the node's id)

methods.name: indexOf
methods.desc: Returns the index of a child node

methods.name: isFirst
methods.desc: Returns true if this node is the first child of its parent

methods.name: isLast
methods.desc: Returns true if this node is the last child of its parent

methods.name: isLeaf
methods.desc: Returns true if this node is a leaf

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.desc: Inserts the first node before the second node in this nodes childNodes collection.

params.name: refNode
params.desc: The node to insert before (if null the node is appended)

methods.name: item
methods.desc: Returns the child node at the specified index.

methods.name: getOwnerTree
methods.desc: Returns the tree this node is in.

methods.name: appendChild
methods.desc: Insert node(s) as the last child node of this node.

params.name: node
params.desc: The node or Array of nodes to append

methods.name: findChildBy
methods.desc:
Finds the first child by a custom function. The child matches if the function passed
returns true.

methods.name: replaceChild
methods.desc: Replaces one child node in this node with another.

methods.name: bubble
methods.desc: Bubbles up the tree from this node, calling the specified function with each node. The scope (this) of function call will be the scope provided or the current node. The arguments to the function will be the args provided or the current node. If the function returns false at any point, the bubble is stopped.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope of the function (defaults to current node)

params.name: args
params.desc: (optional) The args to call the function with (default to passing the current node)

methods.name: eachChild
methods.desc: Interates the child nodes of this node, calling the specified function with each node. The scope (this) of function call will be the scope provided or the current node. The arguments to the function will be the args provided or the current node. If the function returns false at any point, the iteration stops.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope of the function (defaults to current node)

params.name: args
params.desc: (optional) The args to call the function with (default to passing the current node)

methods.name: findChild
methods.desc: Finds the first child that has the attribute with the specified value.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: *beforeappend
events.desc: Fires before a new child is appended, return false to cancel the append.

params.name: node
params.desc: The child node to be appended

events.name: *move
events.desc: Fires when this node is moved to a new location in the tree

params.name: oldParent
params.desc: The old parent of this node

params.name: newParent
params.desc: The new parent of this node

params.name: index
params.desc: The index it was moved to

events.name: *append
events.desc: Fires when a new child node is appended

params.name: index
params.desc: The index of the newly appended node

events.name: *beforeremove
events.desc: Fires before a child is removed, return false to cancel the remove.

params.name: node
params.desc: The child node to be removed

events.name: *remove
events.desc: Fires when a child node is removed

events.name: *beforeinsert
events.desc: Fires before a new child is inserted, return false to cancel the insert.

params.name: node
params.desc: The child node to be inserted

params.name: refNode
params.desc: The child node the node is being inserted before

events.name: *insert
events.desc: Fires when a new child node is inserted.

params.name: refNode
params.desc: The child node the node was inserted before

events.name: *beforemove
events.desc: Fires before this node is moved to a new location in the tree. Return false to cancel the move.

params.name: newParent
params.desc: The new parent this node is moving to

params.name: index
params.desc: The index it is being moved to
